sense.def:
Wrinkles
so črte, ki nastanejo na človekovem obrazu, ko se stara.

seg.quote: His small eyes were surrounded by many wrinkles.
...a very old woman with a wrinkled face.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
wrinkles
, na tistem nastanejo gube ali črte.

seg.quote: Clean the surface well or the paint might wrinkle and peel.
He's always telling me that the sun will wrinkle my skin.
She looked to make sure her dress wasn't wrinkled.

sense.def:
To wrinkle one's nose or forehead
pomeni stisniti mišice na obrazu, da se koža na nosu ali čelu naguba.

seg.quote: He wrinkled his nose. ‘What an awful smell.’
